p: Some comorbidities were present before treatment in the group of patients. Five thalassemia major subjects suffered with heart disease, and two HbS/Î² thalassemia cases with kidney disease. Moreover, a case of hepatocellular carcinoma, a cryoglobulinemia with neuropathy, a subject with essential thrombocytopenia, and a case with a pulmonary embolism event were present in thalassemia major patients ( Table 1).
